Welcome to CoderBot all-new website

  1. CoderBot
  2. Blog
  3. Welcome to CoderBot all-new website

Posted on 01/10/2014 by CoderBot doc announce

CoderBot finally gets a whole new website with all the information required to actually make the robot out of industry-standard parts.

Check out the CoderBot mechanics and hardware documentation for mechanical and electronics assembly instructions. Check out the CoderBot software documentation for instructions on installing and configuring the software components.
